description: Enterprise reporting table for Contact specific Learner items in Patient education Record.

columns.name: PED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the patient education record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for contact specific learner items in the patient education record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date for contact specific learner items in patient education record.. Store in external format.

columns.name: LEARNER_KEY
columns.description: The key for contact specific learner items in patient education record.

columns.name: LEARNER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The learner category for contact specific learner items in patient education record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient


Family


Significant Other


Caregiver


Other

columns.name: READINESS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The learner readiness category for contact specific learner items in patient education record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Eager


Acceptance


Nonacceptance


Refuses

columns.name: TEACHING_METHOD
columns.description: The method of teaching for contact specific learner items in patient education record.

columns.name: RESPONSE
columns.description: The learner response for contact specific learner items in patient education record.

columns.name: TAUGHT_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: The teaching user ID for contact specific learner items in patient education record. It is stored in internal ID format and is linked to the user master file.

columns.name: TAUGHT_AT_INS
columns.description: Date/Time stamp for the instance of teaching for contact specific learner items in patient education record.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status category for contact specific learner items in patient education record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


N/A


Done


Deleted


Not Started


In Progress

columns.name: ENTER_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: User ID of the user who added the point associated with the row of learning.

columns.name: ENTER_AT_INS
columns.description: The data entry instant for contact specific learner items in patient education record.

columns.name: LEARNER_COMMENT
columns.description: The learner's comment- contact specific.

columns.name: DELETED_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the user who deleted the contact specific learner items in the patient education record.

columns.name: DELETED_AT_INS
columns.description: The instant of deletion for contact specific learner items in patient education record.

columns.name: TITLE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient education title, which contains the point that is associated with this row of documentation. This column is frequently used to link to tables such as CL_PAT_EDU_TITLE, CL_PATEDU_CNT_TITL, and IP_EDU_DATA.

columns.name: TOPIC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient education topic, which contains the point that is associated with this row of documentation. Note that, for points that appear directly beneath titles, this value can be blank. This column is frequently used to link to tables such as CL_PAT_EDU_TOPIC, CL_PATEDU_CT_TOPIC, and IP_EDU_DATA.

columns.name: POINTS_IED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient education point that is associated with this row of documentation. Note that this value is blank for My Point records. This column is frequently used to link to tables such as CL_PAT_EDU_POINT (via POINT_IED_ID), CL_PATEDU_CNTCT_PT (via CNT_POINT_IED_ID), and IP_EDU_DATA (via TTP_ID).

columns.name: MY_POINTS_HNO_ID
columns.description: The first part of the unique ID of the patient education My Point record that is associated with this row of documentation. My Point is a patient education point created on the fly and does not have an education (IED) record associated with it. Note that this column is only populated for My Point records. This column is frequently used (along with MY_POINTS_HNO_DAT) to link to tables such as CL_PAT_EDU_POINT (via MY_POINT_HNO_ID) and CL_PATEDU_CNTCT_PT (via CNT_MYPOINT_HNO_ID).

columns.name: MY_POINTS_HNO_DAT
columns.description: The second part of the unique ID of the patient education My Point record that is associated with this row of documentation. My Point is a patient education point created on the fly and does not have an education (IED) record associated with it. Note that this column is only populated for My Point records. This column is frequently used (along with MY_POINTS_HNO_ID) to link to tables such as CL_PAT_EDU_POINT (via MY_POINT_HNO_DAT) and CL_PATEDU_CNTCT_PT (via CNT_MYPOINT_HNO_DA).

columns.name: LRNR_FIRST_DOSE_MEDICATION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the medication record associated with a first-dose education point. This is blank for points that are not associated with first-dose education for a medication.

columns.name: TITLE_CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.  The contact date will be for the title education row that was documented on.  This can be used along with the TITLE_ID column to join with tables such as IP_EDU_OT_DATA in order to retrieve information for a specific title contact.

columns.name: TOPIC_CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.  The contact date will be for the topic education row that was documented on.  This can be used along with the TOPIC_ID column to join with tables such as IP_EDU_OT_DATA in order to retrieve information for a specific topic contact.

columns.name: POINT_CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.  The contact date will be for the point education row that was documented on.  This can be used along with the POINTS_IED_ID column to join with tables such as IP_EDU_OT_DATA in order to retrieve information for a specific point contact.
